channel.title: Is it illegal?
channel.description:
Is it illegal to take pictures from the internet and put it up on your site? I'm not talking about the professional made pictures, but like pictures made by amateurs?
And before people start acting like retards, yes it's about porn.
and where i could find the laws of making/distributing porn?

item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

Make your own porn.

item.title: Is it illegal?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“OnlyOneRule, post:1, topic:257189”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=339531.msg2632867#msg2632867 date=1232306992]

I do not need the 18 USC 2257 or whatever they are because the type of pictures im about to host do not fall under that law.
And my age is none of your business.

How do you know they don’t fall under that law, when you don’t even know the law? And your age does matter, because you have to be 18+, and sometimes even 21+ to look at the images. Let alone having a site full of them. Just think about it: Would a 14 year old selling booze be allowed, while the age to buy it is 21?
[/quote]
You have to be 21 to buy drink? LMFAO! What retarded country do you live in? 16 here. And 18 for weed and shrooms.[/quote]

I live in the same country as you are, I used 21 because ske probably lives in the US. And shrooms are illegal now idiot

And FastBawlz, you probably misunderstood what I was saying.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it illegal?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:18, topic:257150”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=339531.msg2632867#msg2632867 date=1232306992]

I do not need the 18 USC 2257 or whatever they are because the type of pictures im about to host do not fall under that law.
And my age is none of your business.

How do you know they don’t fall under that law, when you don’t even know the law? And your age does matter, because you have to be 18+, and sometimes even 21+ to look at the images. Let alone having a site full of them. Just think about it: Would a 14 year old selling booze be allowed, while the age to buy it is 21?
[/quote]
Because i know the law.
And where did i mention my age didn’t matter?[/quote]
While not word-for-word [his business compared to not mattering], chances are if you were 18+ you would say that you were 18 or older, instead of saying that it’s “none of your business”. Even if you are 18, it’s just like an innocent person pleading the 5th: people assume you’re guilty, or in this case, under 18.

http://www.google.com/search?q=pornography+laws

Read full topic

item.title: Is it illegal?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Ske:

The pictures are not taken by professionals and most likely do not have copyright.

A work is “copyrighted” as soon as it is created. You do not have to “have” copyright, it is simply a right you automatically have over a work you create.

You can register a copyright in some jurisdictions, all this does is make it known/recorded that you created it first, in case of dispute. A safety net, as it were. It’s not required in order to sue someones ass for distributing your stuff, though.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2009, 10:31:31 pm[/size][hr][quote=“FastBawlz, post:19, topic:257150”]You know, because the cashiers are all above the age of 21.[/quote]

Actually, at least in the UK, the ones serving age restricted products ARE over the age to purchase them. It’s the law. The cash registers have unlock codes which have to be entered by a supervisor to prove the sale was supervised.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it illegal?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:13, topic:257150”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=339531.msg2632638#msg2632638 date=1232291456]
Because you have no idea how the porn industry works (if you did, you would already know where you could get royalty-free images, because there’s a really obvious source).

You have no idea how to handle 18 USC 2257 requests. Or even what they are.

You think that putting a few pics up on a site is gonna make you money without any work.

You are probably under 18, but if not, you should expect that if you set up a porn site with your current knowledge, you could quite easily be in jail or bankrupt within a year.
[/quote]
edit:[quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=339531.msg2632794#msg2632794 date=1232302218]
The owner have copyright even if they don’t write it, unless they say the picture have no copyrigth.
[/quote]
I really don’t think they have copyright unless they mention it.
But basically thats what i’m trying to figure out.[/quote]

Wiki;

In all countries where the Berne Convention standards apply, copyright is automatic, and need not be obtained through official registration with any government office. Once an idea has been reduced to tangible form, for example by securing it in a fixed medium (such as a drawing, sheet music, photograph, a videotape, or a computer file), the copyright holder is entitled to enforce his or her exclusive rights.

There is also their Moral Rights.
The best thing to do would be to ask the owner of the photographs if you can display them on your page.

Read full topic

You have no idea how to handle 18 USC 2257 requests. Or even what they are.

You think that putting a few pics up on a site is gonna make you money without any work.

You are probably under 18, but if not, you should expect that if you set up a porn site with your current knowledge, you could quite easily be in jail or bankrupt within a year.[/quote]
I did not ask you to question my knowlegde on the whole adult entertainment industry.
I did not ask for free porn images, even though i said it would be about porn.
I know exactly how to make my money so dont you worry about that.
I do not need the 18 USC 2257 or whatever they are because the type of pictures im about to host do not fall under that law.
And my age is none of your business.

Can i download pictures then put it on my own website?
The pictures are not taken by professionals and most likely do not have copyright.
